Lily MacKinnon

Re-Wired

RE-WIRED is an A-Z glossary of terms and interviews about the neurodivergent experience, made by and for neurodivergent people. We aim to amplify voices of young neurodivergent adults, this demographic often lacks representation and awareness. To create the visuals for the publication, we facilitated typography workshops with neurodivergent participants, asking them to design letters that reflected aspects of their neurodivergence. Alongside the visual content, this publication shares authentic narratives from various neurodivergent individuals about their journeys, providing support and insight to newly diagnosed neurodivergent people.

https://readymag.website/u2060838403/5514564/
